summary: This module implements a command-line interface command that reports detailed information about the runtime environment, including operating system details, Python version, library versions, and the availability of optional dependencies. It provides utilities for formatting this data, registering the command with an argument parser, and executing the environment inspection.
business_intent: Enable users and developers to quickly diagnose and verify the setup of the Diffusers library by exposing a convenient CLI command that lists system specifications and dependency statuses, facilitating debugging, reproducibility, and support.
